verses.verse: To the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in Ephesus <S%G2179><s%> write <S%G1125><s%>: These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> he that holdeth <S%G2902><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%>, he that walketh <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%>:

I know <S%G1492><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> toil <S%G2873><s%> and2532, 4675 patience <S%G5281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou canst <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bear <S%G941><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> men <S%G2532><s%>, and didst try <S%G3985><s%> them that call <S%G5335><s%> themselves <S%G1511><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they are <S%G1511><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> didst find <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> false <S%G5571><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> didst bear <S%G941><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>'s sake <S%G1223><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hast <S%G2577><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> grown weary <S%G2577><s%>.
But <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> this against <S%G2596><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou didst leave <S%G863><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> love <S%G26><s%>.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> thou art fallen <S%G1601><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>; or else <S%G4190><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%>, <S%G5035><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will move <S%G2795><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> candlestick <S%G3087><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> its <S%G846><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> thou repent <S%G3340><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou hatest <S%G3404><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the Nicolaitans <S%G3531><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2504><s%> hate <S%G3404><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> to the churches <S%G1577><s%>. To him <S%G846><s%> that overcometh <S%G3528><s%>, to him will I give <S%G1325><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tree <S%G3586><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3319><s%> Paradise <S%G3857><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in Smyrna <S%G4668><s%> write <S%G1125><s%>: These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lived again <S%G2198><s%>:

I know <S%G1492><s%> thy4675, Exodus41, 2532 tribulation <S%G2347><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy poverty <S%G4432><s%> (but <S%G1161><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%>), and <S%G2532><s%> the blasphemy <S%G988><s%> of them that <S%G3588><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> they <S%G1438><s%> are <S%G1511><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1438><s%> art not <S%G3756><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> are a synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%>.

Fear <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3367><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> thou art about <S%G3195><s%> to suffer <S%G3958><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%>, the devil <S%G1228><s%> is about <S%G3195><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may be tried <S%G3985><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall have <S%G2192><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>. Be thou <S%G1096><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> to the churches <S%G1577><s%>. He that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> shall <S%G91><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> be hurt <S%G91><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Pergamum <S%G4010><s%> write <S%G1125><s%>: These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> he that hath <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G4501><s%> sharp <S%G3691><s%> two-edged <S%G1366><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%>:

I know <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> thou dwellest <S%G2730><s%>, even where <S%G3699><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%>'s throne <S%G2362><s%> is <S%G2532><s%>; and thou holdest fast <S%G2902><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> didst <S%G720><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days2250, 1722 of <S%G3739><s%> Antipas <S%G493><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> witness <S%G3144><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> one <S%G3739><s%>, who was killed <S%G615><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> dwelleth <S%G2730><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> a few things <S%G3641><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> some that hold <S%G2902><s%> the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of Balaam <S%G903><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> Balak <S%G904><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> a stumblingblock <S%G4625><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>, to eat <S%G5315><s%> things sacrificed to idols <S%G1494><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to commit fornication <S%G4203><s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%> hast <S%G2192><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> some that hold <S%G2902><s%> the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of the Nicolaitans <S%G3531><s%> in like <S%G3739><s%> manner <S%G3404><s%>.

Repent <S%G3340><s%> therefore <S%G1487><s%>; or else3361, 1161 I come <S%G2064><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will make war <S%G4170><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword <S%G4501><s%> of <S%G4750><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> to the churches <S%G1577><s%>. To him <S%G846><s%> that overcometh <S%G3528><s%>, to him <S%G846><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the hidden <S%G2928><s%> manna <S%G3131><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> stone <S%G5586><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the stone <S%G5586><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> but1487, 3361 he that receiveth it <S%G2983><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%> write <S%G1125><s%>: These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, who hath <S%G2192><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> are like <S%G3664><s%> unto burnished brass <S%G5474><s%>:

I know <S%G1492><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> love <S%G26><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ministry <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that thy <S%G4675><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> are more <S%G4119><s%> than the first <S%G4413><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G3641><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou sufferest <S%G1439><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> Jezebel <S%G2403><s%>, who calleth <S%G3004><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> a prophetess <S%G4398><s%>; and she teacheth <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seduceth <S%G4105><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to commit fornication <S%G4203><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> things sacrificed to idols <S%G1494><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I gave <S%G1325><s%> her <S%G846><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> that she should <S%G2443><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> she willeth not <S%G3756><s%> to repent <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G846><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> her <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a bed <S%G2825><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them that commit adultery <S%G3431><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%>, except1437, 3361 they repent <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I will kill <S%G615><s%> her <S%G846><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> shall know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he that searcheth <S%G2045><s%> the reins <S%G3510><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> unto <S%G5213><s%> each one of <S%G1538><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%>, to <S%G2532><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%>, as <S%G3745><s%> many as <S%G3745><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the deep things <S%G899><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> they are wont to say <S%G3004><s%>; I cast <S%G906><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> burden <S%G922><s%>.
Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%>, hold fast <S%G2902><s%> till3739, Leviticus2 I come <S%G2240><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that overcometh <S%G3528><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he that keepeth <S%G5083><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>, to him <S%G846><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> he shall rule <S%G4165><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron <S%G4603><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> the vessels <S%G4632><s%> of the potter <S%G2764><s%> are broken to shivers <S%G4937><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> also have received <S%G2983><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>:
and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G792><s%> morning <S%G4407><s%> star <S%G792><s%>.
He that hath <S%G2192><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> to the churches <S%G1577><s%>.
